name: Randon Aviation
about: Randon Aviation, located in West Jordan, Utah, is the Mountain Westâ€™s leading flight school, dedicated to fostering a culture of safety and providing individualized training. We cater to both hobbyists and career aspirants, offering courses such as Private Pilot, Instrument Rating, Commercial Pilot, and Certified Flight Instructor certifications. Our instructors are selected for their extensive experience and knowledge, ensuring a high standard of training with safety as our top priority. We provide high-quality equipment and a fixed-price program to ensure transparency and cost-effectiveness. Our Accelerated Program is designed for those aiming for airline careers, offering a swift and efficient path to achieving aviation goals. Join us at Randon Aviation for an extraordinary aviation journey.
